mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, password, hashed_password, email, phone, nickname, role, username, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{hashedPassword}, #{email}, #{phone}, IFNULL(#{nickname}, #{userId}), #{role}, #{username}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt});
mapper.select: SELECT username, password, user_sqno AS userSqno FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET verification_code = #{verificationCode}, verification_expired_at = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MINUTE) WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE users SET delYn = 'Y', updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
